tbColumnDateTimeFilter directive in tubular.directives

The tbColumnDateTimeFilter directive is a specific filter with Date and Time editors, instead regular inputs.

The parent scope will provide information about the data type.

Directive's attributes

Param Type Details
title string

Set the popover title.
text string

Set the search text.
argument object

Set the search object (if the search is text use text attribute).
operator string

Set the initial operator, default depends on data type.
